title: Does story time with an e-book change how parents and toddlers interact?

title_detail.value: Does story time with an e-book change how parents and toddlers interact?

summary: Traditional print books may have an edge over e-books when it comes to quality time shared between parents and their children, a new study suggests.

summary_detail.value: Traditional print books may have an edge over e-books when it comes to quality time shared between parents and their children, a new study suggests.
